name: Aioli
description: In Provence, the garlic-infused mayonnaise called aioli is typically served with a platter of raw and boiled vegetables and sometimes fish. With its intense creamy texture and deep garlic flavor, it turns a humble meal into a spectacular one.
recipeIngredient: 1 to 3 garlic cloves, grated or mashed to a paste
1 teaspoon lemon juice, more to taste
1/8 teaspoon fine sea salt, more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Combine garlic, lemon juice and salt in a blender or food processor and let sit a minute or two. Add eggs and blend until combined. With the blender running, slowly add the olive oil in a thin, steady stream. You can use a mortar and pestle if you prefer.
Taste for seasoning and add more salt and lemon juice if needed.
